body.name: Air Fryer Toaster Oven, 14QT Air Fryers Ovens, 4-In-1 Toaster Convection Oven, Smart Toaster Air Fryer Combo, Countertop Oven Toaster With Warm, Broil, Bake, Brushed Stainless Steel Finish
features: Cater to Family Needs: Featuring a 14QT capacity and 3-layer even cooking, this toaster oven fryer can accommodate up to 4 slices of bread, a 9-inch pizza, or 700g of chicken wings. Its versatility makes it ideal for crafting family meals or festive dinners

Uniform Cooking with 360° Hot Air Circulation: The 360° heat circulation technology evenly distributes heat throughout the cavity, delivering crispy and golden results with 85% less fat compared to deep frying

Complete Culinary Convenience: Enhance your culinary journey with this countertop air fryer, equipped with versatile functions such as keep warm, broil, bake, and air fry. Prepare a diverse range of dishes, from cakes, chicken, and fish to pizza, steak, toast, and even fries, effortlessly utilizing the versatility of this appliance

User-Friendly Knob Operation: Experience culinary convenience with the CKOZESE Air Fryer Oven's simple 3-knob control system. Effortlessly manage the timer, temperature, function, opening up a world of cooking versatility

Food-Grade Stainless Steel: Utilizing food-grade stainless steel of superior quality, our air fryer toaster oven combo prioritizes safety, durability, and easy upkeep. To further streamline convenience, it comes complete with four dishwasher-safe accessories: a baking pan, grill rack, frying basket, and crumb tray

Effortless Cleaning: Easily maintain cleanliness as all removable accessories are dishwasher-safe. For the air fryer oven's surface and interior, a simple wipe with a damp cloth after cooling down is all it takes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Air fryer feature works well
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice, modern looking oven. It's a bit deeper and higher than a typical toaster oven so be sure you have a good spot for it in your kitchen. Baking and broiling are comparable to the typical functionality found in toaster ovens. What stands this oven apart is the air fryer feature. A frying tray is included with the oven, and I tested it on some frozen potatoes (French fries and hash browns). The internal fan circulates the hot air around the food, resulting in the "air frying". This worked very well but requires some experimentation. Most recipes say to preheat the oven but there's no preheat function. You just have to turn on the oven and give it several minutes to warm up. The length of time you actually "fry" food may be stated in a recipe but it's still just guidance.When operating, the oven makes noise from the fan but it's not particularly loud. An internal light is always on when running and you get a good view of your food as it is cooking through the window on the front door. It's well insulated and the air around the oven was not especially hot, although caution is still needed to not touch the metal top and sides of the oven.I've never used an air fryer before, but I can already tell that food cooks faster and some food will cook better than using the baking or broiling feature in a typical toaster oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: OK, so it took a while for me to get around to using this, but wow I should have used this sooner! I have to disclose that I am VERY opposed to using microwaves, so I often cook or re-heat things in the oven. However this convenient Air Fryer/Toaster Oven allows me to quickly cook and heat things. So far I've only used it for toasting garlic bread and re-heating, but I'm sure there are TONS of things you can use this for. It's pretty compact, but has generous space, fitting on the counter. Cleanup is easy and it comes with racks, pans and everything you need. This will be great when I need to quickly make my kids a snack or meal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Air fryer oven
reviews.reviewText: I use my fryer/over on a regular | My food always looks amazing | The settings work great | It was not hard to use | Easy to clean | Top quality | Great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This compact air fryer is a gem of an appliance. Quickly cooks up food. My v chicken patties were perfectly crisped at a setting of 375 for 7 minutes. It's ready to go and compact, so isn't an eyesore on the countertops. I appreciate the stainless steel--easy to wipe down and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Air Fryer Oven
reviews.reviewText: Great little oven! I air fried chicken in it last night and I couldn't be more pleased! It came out perfect! I'll never go back to grease frying!!!
